author: Kieran Oudshoorn
title: Front-line health staff seek housing to isolate and keep their families safe
description: With hospitals in British Columbia treating COVID-19 patients, front-line staff are worried about carrying the virus into their own homes.
content:
As hospitals in British Columbia treat patients with  COVID-19, front-line staff are worried about carrying the virus into their own homes and are reaching out to their community to find alternate places stay. 
"This virus could be anywhere, I could have bro… [+2700 chars]
